flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: A convenient and spacious stroller bag that attaches to any stroller with two short side straps, that snap on and off. Then, once you need to grab your baby, the bag, and go...quickly convert the bag into a messenger bag with one long strap (permanently attached) and you're ready to go! No more hassle of shoving your bag/purse under the stroller or trying to fit your bag straps over the handlebars. Relief!
guide.introduction_rendered: A convenient and spacious stroller bag that attaches to any stroller with two short side straps, that snap on and off. Then, once you need to grab your baby, the bag, and go...quickly convert the bag into a messenger bag with one long strap (permanently attached) and you're ready to go! No more hassle of shoving your bag/purse under the stroller or trying to fit your bag straps over the handlebars. Relief!
guide.summary: Convenient Stroller Bag quickly turns into a Messenger Bag for moms/dads on the go.
guide.title: Stroller Bag into Messenger Bag
